means: 侮辱，辱骂，侮辱性的言论( insult的名词复数 )
侮辱，冒犯( insult的第三人称单数 )

sentence.Network_en: Children would settle disputes by trading punches or insults in the schoolyard.
sentence.Network_cn: 儿童会通过在操场上对打或互骂的方式解决争端。

sentence.Network_en: He shouted insults at the boy who had kicked him.
sentence.Network_cn: 他大声辱骂那个踢了他的男孩.

sentence.Network_en: I will by no manner of means put up with such insults.
sentence.Network_cn: 我绝不会容忍这种侮辱.

PerfectNetExp.abs: Pompeii ' s graffiti includes insults , love declarations , and political satire ., 庞贝的涂鸦包括侮辱言辞 , 情宣言和政治嘲讽.
Stop all these insults ., 停止这些侮辱性的行为.
he suffered their insults in silence ., 他默默忍受他们所施加的伤害.
I ' ve had a basinful of his insults , and next time I ' ll tell him so ., 我已忍受了他极大的侮辱 , 下次我会让他知道的.

list.abs: to call a brave man a coward is an insult ., 把勇士称为懦夫是一种侮辱.
radiation injury of skin 皮肤辐射损伤radiation insult 辐射伤害radiation intensity 辐射强度
压轴好戏 in English, translation,... ... 戏仿 parody;imitation 戏侮 to insult 显轴买麻藤 gnetum gnemon.
I ' m not trying to insult you ., 我不是在侮辱你.

entry.def: If someone insults you, they say or do something that is rude or offensive.

example.ex: I did not mean to insult you...
Buchanan said he was insulted by the judge's remarks.
example.tran: 布坎南说法官的那番话侮辱了他。

entry.def: An insult is a rude remark, or something a person says or does which insults you.

example.ex: Their behaviour was an insult to the people they represent...
example.tran: 他们的行为是对他们代表的人民的一种侮辱。

example.ex: The prison Governor criticised some of his officers who shouted insults at prisoners on the roof.
example.tran: 监狱长批评了一些站在屋顶上大声辱骂囚犯的狱警。

entry.tran: 更为不公的是;更不可接受的是;更糟的是
entry.def: You say to add insult to injury when mentioning an action or fact that makes an unfair or unacceptable situation even worse.

example.ex: The driver of the car that killed Smith got a £250 fine and five penalty points on his licence. To add insult to injury, he drove away from court in his own car.
example.tran: 撞死史密斯的汽车司机仅被罚款250英镑，驾照上扣了5分。更让人不可接受的是,他竟然开着自己的车从法院扬长而去。

auth_sentence.content: To Mr. Irvine, insults are mostly about status.
auth_sentence.res_content: To Mr. Irvine, insults are mostly about status.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: To Mr. Irvine, insults are mostly about status.

auth_sentence.content: Throwing insults is a very primitive method of discourse.
auth_sentence.res_content: Throwing insults is a very primitive method of discourse.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Throwing insults is a very primitive method of discourse.

auth_sentence.content: Yelling insults at me doesn't change my mind.
auth_sentence.res_content: Yelling insults at me doesn't change my mind.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Yelling insults at me doesn't change my mind.
